instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1706: What is A1706? A1706 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years 2016, Mid 2017 with EMC 3071, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00239, 820-00923..
definitions.A1502: What is A1502? A1502 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years Mid 2014, Late 2013, Early 2015 with EMC 2875, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-3476, 820-3536, 820-4924..

threads.title: Macbook pro 13 <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1706</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> touch bar keyboard only replacement
threads.message:
Anyone was able to replace only the keyboard on <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1706</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> touch bar , the pins very weak and breakable not like <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> model .
and the screws needed smaller than the one used on <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> model .
or to use just glue ?
